prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Guitar, Piano, Drums, but without Brass.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Bass, Guitar, Piano, and Drums, but no Brass.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Bass, Guitar, Piano, and Drums, excluding Brass.

Style 3:
This composition consists of Bass, Guitar, Piano, and Drums, omitting Brass.
